remarks: The implications of being a linearly independent subset.  (Contributed by AV, 13-Apr-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 30-Jul-2019.)
statement:
islininds.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
islininds.z $e |- Z = ( 0g ` M ) $.
islininds.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` M ) $.
islininds.e $e |- E = ( Base ` R ) $.
islininds.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
linindsi $p |- ( S linIndS M -> ( S e. ~P B /\ A. f e. ( E ^m S ) ( ( f finSupp .0. /\ ( f ( linC ` M ) S ) = Z ) -> A. x e. S ( f ` x ) = .0. ) ) ) $.
$d E f $.
$d M f x $.
$d S f x $.
